text: Harald Olof "Olle" Ingemar Nygren (11 November 1929 â€“ 13 February 2021) was a Swedish speedway rider. He was born in Stockholm. He reached the finals of the Speedway World Championship five times.Belton, Brian (2003). Hammerin' Round. Stroud: Tempus Publishing Nygren was Swedish Champion in 1949 and became Nordic Champion in 1960. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Stockholm Category:Speedway riders
